document_data.name: Bezrim Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Bezrim Bay''' was a small inlet found within the [[Lake of Steam]] of [[south Faerûn]].<ref name=EotSS-p167">{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M">
document_data.Geography: The bay was located in the southwest corner of the Lake of Steam.  It was wedged between the [[Narrows Trail]] to the west with the island of [[Felmer's Keep]] and a small peninsula from the mainland in the east.<ref name=EotSS-p167"/><ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.Notable Locations: The city of [[Yeshpek]] was founded along Bezrim Bay.<ref name=EotSS-p167"/><ref name=EotSS.M"/>
